name: Baby Simulator (itch)
description:
Baby Simulator Description

Hello everyone, I'm Nicki from M&L. I'm 11 years old and my friend and I made our first game. My friend is 12 years old and we hope that you enjoy the game. If you like to help us with our projects, then leave a product donation.

Thanks

Baby Simulator is a game where you go around and do some funny things such as:

  • climb on the TV
  • open doors
  • fall into the bath
  • go up and down the stairs

The map of Baby Simulator is one big platformer:

  • climb on the shops in the city
  • jump over the floor
  • jump into the bathroom
  • run through the city
  • run over house roofs

Made with Unity personal edition.

Known bugs:

Left mouseclick in pause menu makes pointer disappear in main menu - but it works if you right click in the pause menu!

Please rate and support.

Have a nice day!

;)
